scripts.clean:android: cd apps/mobile/android && ./gradlew clean && cd ../../../ && find ./apps/mobile/android -name 'build' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find ./apps/mobile/android -name '.kotlin' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find ./apps/mobile/android -name '.gradle' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
